testcase.classname: To validate the functionality of Metallica application
testcase.name: To validate login & logout using valid userName and valid Password
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to login page............................................passed And User enter valid userName and valid Password............................passed And User click Login button.................................................passed Then User should be in a dashboard page.....................................passed And User click Logout.......................................................passed
